Sivir.name: Sivirº
Sivir.title: ºøthe Battle Mistressøº
Sivir.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe beautiful and deadly champion known as Sivir has been a favorite of League summoners for close to a decade. A soldier-for-hire outside of the Fields of Justice, she is the embodiment of a highly successful mercenary on modern day Runeterra. Sivir has little interest in the ''cribbage sheets'' - as she calls them - of League influence bartering. Instead, she is motivated by material wealth and riches, and she is paid handsomely for her services. Sivir is one of the wealthiest individuals found anywhere on Valoran. Sivir owns multiple residences in a number of different city-states, as well as ownership stakes in a number of businesses all across Valoran. Her detractors, either envious of her success or acrimonious of her flexible morality, have begun to use Sivir as a symbol of what is wrong with the mercenary nature of the League. Sivir dismisses her critics, saying that while her personal code of ethics is less ruthless than her competitors, ''Everyone has a price.''ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir has earned many titles and accolades throughout her illustrious career, but the one she held until recently was ''Battle Mistress of Noxus''. Now she is simply known as ''The Battle Mistress'' after breaking her contract with the Noxian High Command. Sivir dared to object to the Noxian war against the peaceful island state of Ionia, though less about the morality of the issue than the planning behind it; her predictions of a bloody stalemate came true when the Ionians held off the relentless assaults of the Noxians. Claiming that the Noxian High Command had lost its direction, she left Noxus and made her services available to the Institute of War. The Noxian High Command has sent a number of contracted assassins to deal with its rogue mercenary, but none have delivered her or survived.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''Time and time again, Sivir proves that she has earned the right to call herself 'The Battle Mistress'.''ºøºøºøºøºøº
-- Jaxº
Sivir.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe beautiful and deadly champion known as Sivir has been a favorite of League summoners for close to a decade.  A soldier-for-hire outside of the ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir's Boomerang Blade returns to her after reaching the max range, so you can shift position to hit enemies who would otherwise have evaded it.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºUsing Frozen Mallet or Phage in conjunction with On the Hunt ensures that you and your teammates are able to hit opponents non-stop.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRicochet resets Sivir's basic attack timer on activation, so activating this immediately after landing a normal basic attack will maximize damage output.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBoomerang Blade costs a lot of mana to cast, so dodging it sets Sivir back. If it hits you on the way out, avoid its path on the way back.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSivir is a powerful pushing champion, so leaving her unattended in a lane for too long will often result in your turrets being destroyed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen laning against Sivir as a caster, it may be possible to throw off Sivir's timing on her Spell Shield by faking an advance and backing off.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøBoomerang Bladeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºSivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøSivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø physical damage to the first unit and øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºøºø% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of ºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: ºRicochetº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøSivir's next basic attack will bounce between targets, dealing reduced damage with each successive hit.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøSivir's next basic attack will bounce to øºøº{{ e1 }}ºøº additional targets, dealing ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø to the first target and ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøº% less damage with each bounce (only the first hit procs item effects).ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºSpell Shieldº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøCreates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana  back if a spell is blocked.øºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøSivir creates a magical barrier for ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºø seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøIf an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains ºøºøº{{ e2 }} Mana.º

spells.name: ºOn The Huntº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøSivir leads her allies into battle granting them increased Movement and Attack Speeds for a period of time.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøSivir's battle prowess emanates for ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø seconds, increasing her Movement Speed by ºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% and Attack Speed by øº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºøºø%. Nearby allies gain the Movement Speed bonus and half of the Attack Speed bonus for the duration.øºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøFleet of Footº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøSivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.øºøºøºøº
